tools/extents.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Report the extents of a dataset and its meshes.

Source
/home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/extents.c,v
Revision
1.10
Date
2006/11/17 22:51:25

Description: Usage: extents [options] dataset [mesh_name]

Reports the bounding box of each mesh in a dataset and the bounding box of the entired dataset.

Todo:
?Add a flag to get overall average of edges?
Modifications:
  • 05/24/2006 WSD Created.

#include <string.h>

00303     if (numDim > ds_numDim)

00308     if (doDispl) {

00326       // do a seq displ variable

00329      for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00330        combinedlow[j] = -1;
00331        combinedhigh[j] = -2;

00340        rc = combine_bb(numDim, lowpoint, highpoint, &combinedlow,
